tool_description: Find the estimated population within a radius.
name: Population Inside Radius
title: Population Inside Radius

api_list.name: PopulationInsideRadius

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude value as a decimal number

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude value as a decimal number

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Year of population dataset. Defaults to 2020
